title: Mechanism of PCNA loading by Ctf18-RFC for leading-strand DNA synthesis | Science
content: The proliferating cell nuclear antigen (PCNA) clamp encircles DNA to hold DNA polymerases (Pols) to DNA for processivity. The Ctf18-RFC PCNA loader, a replication factor C (RFC) variant, is specific to the leading-strand Pol (PolÎµ). We reveal here the ...
